pages.text: mina l-mu'minina rijalun sadaqu ma ʿahadu l-laha ʿalayhi famin'hum man qada nahbahu wamin'hum man yantaziru wama baddalu tabdilan
liyajziya l-lahu l-sadiqina bisid'qihim wayuʿadhiba l-munafiqina in shaa aw yatuba ʿalayhim inna l-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
waradda l-lahu alladhina kafaru bighayzihim lam yanalu khayran wakafa l-lahu l-mu'minina l-qitala wakana l-lahu qawiyyan ʿazizan
wa-anzala alladhina zaharuhum min ahli l-kitabi min sayasihim waqadhafa fi qulubihimu l-ruʿ'ba fariqan taqtuluna watasiruna fariqan
wa-awrathakum ardahum wadiyarahum wa-amwalahum wa-ardan lam tatauha wakana l-lahu ʿala kulli shayin qadiran
yaayyuha l-nabiyu qul li-azwajika in kuntunna turid'na l-hayata l-dun'ya wazinataha fataʿalayna umattiʿ'kunna wa-usarrih'kunna sarahan jamilan
wa-in kuntunna turid'na l-laha warasulahu wal-dara l-akhirata fa-inna l-laha aʿadda lil'muh'sinati minkunna ajran ʿaziman
yanisaa l-nabiyi man yati minkunna bifahishatin mubayyinatin yudaʿaf laha l-ʿadhabu diʿ'fayni wakana dhalika ʿala l-lahi yasiran
